custom_notifications.title: Custom notifications
custom_notifications.description: Select when you want to get notified when a new change occurs in your campaigns.

discount_settings.enable_widget: Enable and customize widgets on "app embeds" section in your theme settings to show discount value

feature_request_card.title: Feature request
feature_request_card.subtitle: Please share your thoughts and needs about our application and tell us what would make you more happy :)

field_labels.apply_independently: Apply to each item in the cart independently
field_labels.automatic_update: Automatically update eligible products with every change to store products
field_labels.combinations_policy: This campaign can be combined with:
field_labels.discount_policy_change_price: Change sale price and calculate discounts based on:
field_labels.discount_policy_keep_price: Keep sale price and increase "compare-at price"
field_labels.general_combinations_policy: General discount and clearance sale campaigns
field_labels.only_once_per_order: Only apply discount once per order
field_labels.order_submitted_notifications_enable: Order on discounted products is submitted
field_labels.subject: Subject
field_labels.volume_combinations_policy: Quantity and volume discount sale campaigns

help_texts.apply_independently: If not selected, the minimum requirements will be applied to all items in the cart together.
help_texts.contact_email: We'll use this email address to inform you about your account, important changes and reports.
help_texts.disable_combination_keep_sale_price: The campaign can't be combined with general discount when the discount is set to "{{discount_policy_label}}"
help_texts.disable_combination_new_price: The campaign can't be combined with {{discount_type}}when the discount is set to 'new price'
help_texts.only_once_per_order: If not selected, the amount will be taken off each eligible item in an order.
help_texts.prevent_combination: Enabling this option will deactivate Shopify "amount off products" discounts (both automatic discounts and discount codes) on products in your Discounty active campaigns.
help_texts.action_notifications_enable: Email will be sent to you when you create a new campaign or make changes to the status of a campaign
help_texts.campaign_process_start_notifications_ena: Email will be sent to you when the process of adding discounts starts as scheduled
help_texts.campaign_expiration_start_notifications_: Email will be sent to you when an active campaign expires as scheduled, and the process of removing discounts starts
help_texts.campaign_start_notifications_enable: Email will be sent to you when the process of adding discounts is finished and discounts are live on your store
help_texts.campaign_finish_notifications_enable: Email will be sent to you when the process of deactivating a campaign is finished and discounts have been removed from your store
help_texts.order_submitted_notifications_enable: Email will be sent to you when customers purchase products from your active campaigns at a discounted price

leave_page_modal.content: If you leave this page, any unsaved changes will be lost.
leave_page_modal.title: Unsaved changes

onboarding.title: Let's start step by step
onboarding.subtitle: Dear admin of {{store}}, boost your customers conversions with a discount sale
onboarding.create_campaign_subtitle: Add discount to your products by creating a discount campaign
onboarding.product_page_title: Show the volume and quantity discount on the product page
onboarding.product_page_content_1: 1. Go to "App embeds" section of your theme settings
onboarding.cart_page_title: Display the discount value on the cart page
onboarding.cart_page_content_1: 1. Go to "App embeds" section of your theme settings
onboarding.cart_page_content_2: 2. Enable Discounty's "saving on cart" app extension
onboarding.cart_page_content_3: 3. Customize the text and appearance of the widget

plan_card.variants_limit: Up to {{limit}} variants with live discount

top_campaigns.title: Top {{count}} campaigns
top_campaigns.no_campaigns: There are no campaigns with sales
